goal.ch:
“學習科學新知與科學知識的表達方式
學習如何與同儕交流
檢視化學專業知識。“
goal.en:
“Learn new science knowledge and how to do scientific presentation
Exchange ideas with peer students
Review one‘s professional knowledge“

outline.ch:
“每位同學報告40 ± 5分鐘；其他同學和老師發問5-10分鐘。
當周報告的同學請於報告當周星期一中午十二點前，將以下文件email給任課教師(報告的Paper PDF file及Power Point 投影片)。
長篇論文的選擇需同時符合以下規定:需和化學相關，次領域不限。為SCI期刊且Impact Factor 高於2.50。出版年份需為西元2012年以後。推薦American Chemical Society (ACS) 發行的期刊 (www.acs.org)“
outline.en:
“A 35-45 minute-presentation on SCI paper (after 2012 with Impact Factor > 2.5) following by a 5-10 minute questioning session
On the presentation week, you need to e-mail the files (paper PDF file and your PowerPoint file) to the instructing professor before Monday 12:00 pm.
Papers from journals published by American Chemical Society (www.acs.org)are highly recommended.“
